directions: Combine oats, almond flour, almond butter, pumpkin puree, stevia sugar substitute, almond extract, cloves, nutmeg, cinnamon, and sea salt in a food processor; pulse just until combined.
Roll mixture into balls and arrange on a plate or baking sheet; refrigerate until set, at least 30 minutes.
ingredients: 1 packet stevia sugar substitute (such as Truvia®)
title: Pumpkin Almond Joy Bites
